findings.title: Drop.sol: The start date of a drop can be zero
findings.description: The start date for a drop can be set to zero in function `addDropData()` allowing anyone to overwrite the drop data.

findings.title: DropFactory.sol: Constructor allows the fee to be more than 20%
findings.description: The DropFactory contract's constructor allows setting the fee to be more than 20%, unlike the updateFee() method.
